post.desc:
While Rumia is often used as the subject when it comes to "eating human meat", I don't think the "eating anything" angle has been used that much?

It's a pretty solid take to follow. That the characters who canonically have expressed their desire to eat human meat (e.g. Rumia, Meiling, Mystia...) are really just **gluttons**. Like, they'll salivate just as much over beef or chicken.

The vibe I picked from the *Perfect Memento* is that yōkai just so happen to not have anything against eating human meat.
